full_summary:
# Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Software System

**Notice Type:** Advance Procurement Notice

**Solicitation Title:** Enterprise Resource Planning Software System

**Contract Number:** DCC-IT-020-03

**Publication Date:** November 22, 2024

**Closing Date:** January 10, 2025, at 14:00 EST

## Background

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) intends to acquire a modern Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software system to replace its legacy ERP system. The current system serves approximately 1,300 users across Canada and needs replacement. DCC estimates that it will require the following modules in the ERP software system to meet its requirements:

* Financial Management
* Human Resource Management
* Procurement
* Project Management

## Security Requirements

To participate in the procurement process, vendors must hold or obtain all required security clearances prior to contract award. The anticipated security clearances for vendors are:

* Designated Organization Screening (DOS) with approved Document Safeguarding Capability at the level of Protected B
* Completed Cloud Service Provider Information Technology Security assessment (ITSM.50.100) for its cloud-based system
* Security Assessment and Authorization (SA&A) of the system in-scope of the contract

## Procurement Process

DCC is providing vendors early access to the security clearance application process through sponsorship under its Industrial Security Program (ISP). Vendors can begin the sponsorship process by submitting an application to DCC, providing the contract number DCC-IT-020-03 and the level of clearance requested.

Once the sponsorship request package is completed, the documents will be sent to the Public Services and Procurement Canada's (PSPC) Contract Security Program (CSP) for processing. The CSP will communicate directly with the vendor regarding the status of the sponsorship request package.

## Contact Information

Procurement Specialist
Defence Construction Canada
Telephone: 343-549-1737
Email: paul.chouinard@dcc-cdc.gc.ca

## Disclaimer

DCC is only providing assistance with the sponsorship process and does not guarantee the success of the sponsorship request package or the granting of the security clearance(s) by the CSP. The processing of a sponsorship request package or a security clearance application is subject to the respective terms, conditions, and timelines of DCC's ISP sponsorship process and the CSP security clearance granting process.
